trans-unit.source: Provides methods that control the lifetime of an add-in.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法，控制增益集的存留期。

trans-unit.source: Because the add-in model provides the ability for add-ins to communicate between application domains and between processes, it cannot rely on the garbage collector to reclaim them.
trans-unit.target: 增益集模型可讓您的應用程式定義域之間和處理序之間通訊的增益集，因為它不能依賴記憶體回收行程回收它們。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a reference counting mechanism for the add-in by obtaining a lifetime token to its contract.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會提供參考計數機制增益集，取得其合約存留期語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: When a ContractHandle object is constructed, it calls the <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractBase.AcquireLifetimeToken%2A> method on the contract that is passed to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 當建構 ContractHandle 物件時，它會呼叫<xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractBase.AcquireLifetimeToken%2A>傳遞至建構函式在合約上的方法。</xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractBase.AcquireLifetimeToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the ContractHandle object is disposed or finalized, it calls the <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractBase.RevokeLifetimeToken%2A> method on the contract, which removes its hold on the contract.
trans-unit.target: 當 ContractHandle 物件已處置或最終處理時，它會呼叫<xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractBase.RevokeLifetimeToken%2A>合約，代表要移除其保留在合約上的方法。</xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractBase.RevokeLifetimeToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adapters implement the contract.
trans-unit.target: 配接器實作的合約。

trans-unit.source: The ContractHandle class is designed to be used in a contract-to-view adapter to help pipeline developers manage the lifetime of the contract that is being adapted.
trans-unit.target: ContractHandle 類別被為了協助管理所調整合約的存留期的管線開發人員使用合約來檢視配接器中。

trans-unit.source: Typically, an instance of this class is instantiated during the construction of the adapter class and is stored in an instance field of the adapter.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，此類別的執行個體具現化配接器類別的建構期間，儲存在配接器的執行個體欄位。

trans-unit.source: When the adapter class is garbage-collected, the ContractHandle object will also be collected and the ContractHandle object will revoke the lifetime token on the contract.
trans-unit.target: 當記憶體回收的配接器類別，也會收集 ContractHandle 物件和 ContractHandle 物件會撤銷合約上的存留期語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that your view-to-contract adapters inherit from the <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 建議您檢視合約的介面卡繼承<xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractBase>類別。</xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractBase>

trans-unit.source: You can then use a default implementation for the members of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract>, which means you need to implement only the members of your specific contract.
trans-unit.target: 您接著可以使用的預設實作的成員<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract>，這表示您需要實作您的特定合約的成員。</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The contract to use in the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 要在管線中使用的合約。

trans-unit.source: contract is .
trans-unit.target: contractis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance of the add-in-side adapter when the application domain was created.
trans-unit.target: 建立應用程式定義域時，請取得增益集端配接器的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The add-in-side adapters are typed as <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract>.
trans-unit.target: 增益集端配接器的型別為<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract>.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract>

trans-unit.source: If the application domain was previously created by a user, there is no owner.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者先前已建立的應用程式定義域，但是沒有擁有者。

trans-unit.source: The application domain to check.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.IContract"></xref> object that represents the owner of the application domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.IContract"> </xref>表示應用程式網域的擁有者的物件。

trans-unit.source: domain is .
trans-unit.target: domainis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the contract used by a pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 取得管線所使用的合約。

trans-unit.source: The contract, which is derived from <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.IContract"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自合約<xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.IContract"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an application domain is owned by the specified contract.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否要將應用程式定義域擁有所指定的合約。

trans-unit.source: The contract to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的合約。

trans-unit.source: The application domain to check.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the contract owns the application domain; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果合約擁有應用程式定義域。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: contract or domain is .
trans-unit.target: contractor domain is .

trans-unit.source: Revokes the lifetime token on a contract, regardless of input.
trans-unit.target: 撤銷合約，不論輸入中的存留期語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Revokes the lifetime token on the contract regardless of input and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 撤銷不論輸入合約上的存留期語彙基元，並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources associated with the <xref href="System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 與相關聯的資源釋出<xref href="System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's Finalize method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的 Finalize 方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When called by the garbage collector, this method calls the <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 當記憶體回收行程所呼叫，這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29>方法。</xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29>
